title: Ticket #7255: 50ec2.config sets COLLECTOR_HOST to EC2 Public IP
description:
A user just had problems starting an HTCondor pool is EC2 because 50ec2.config sets COLLECTOR_HOST to its own EC2 Public IP. This is useful if you're running condor_annex from that host, or that host is a CM, but actively harmful otherwise, because you would expect to be able to set CONDOR_HOST and not have to change COLLECTOR_HOST. Not sure what do about this. Maybe just document it where CONDOR_HOST is normally set?

The user confirms they pulled the AMI they were using out of the Marketplace.
